archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.4.3f: f) changes should be verified to ensure that they do not infringe upon existing compliance and regulatory requirements (e.g. ISO/IEC 27001:2013, the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR) or PCI DSS)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
